mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.title, h.content, h.inserted, h.updated, u.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount FROM tb_board_help h JOIN tb_user u ON h.memberId = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_reply_help r ON h.id = r.boardId WHERE content like concat('%',#{search},'%' ) GROUP BY h.id ORDER BY h.id DESC
SELECT id, postId, fileName, url, isThumbnail FROM tb_file_help WHERE postId =#{boardId}

SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, (SELECT count(postId) FROM tb_board_help_up WHERE postId = p.id) up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT hu.userId FROM tb_board_help_up hu WHERE hu.userId = #{loginId} AND hu.postId=p.id) upposession FROM tb_board_help p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId LEFT JOIN tb_reply_help r ON p.id = r.boardId
GROUP BY p.id Order By p.id DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.memberId, p.location, (SELECT count(postId) FROM tb_board_help_up WHERE postId = p.id) up, p.views, p.tag, p.title, p.content, p.inserted, p.updated, m.nickname, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT hu.userId FROM tb_board_help_up hu WHERE hu.userId = #{loginId} AND hu.postId=p.id) upposession FROM tb_board_help p JOIN tb_user m ON m.id = p.memberId LEFT JOIN tb_reply_help r ON p.id = r.boardId
WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board_help (memberId, location, tag, title, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{location}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board_help SET tag = #{tag}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_board_help SET views = views +1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, postId, fileName, COUNT(postId) countpostId FROM tb_file_help GROUP BY postId;
SELECT id, postId, fileName, COUNT(postId) countpostId FROM tb_file_help WHERE postId=#{id} GROUP BY postId;
